scripts.build:report: (cd ../report-react && npm run build && cd ../accessibility-checker-extension && shx cp ../report-react/build/genReport.tsx ./src/ts/util/htmlReport/)
scripts.build:dev: node preprocess && npm run build:report && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack --mode production
scripts.build:prod: node preprocess && npm run build:report && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack --mode production && shx mv dist/background*.js dist/background.js
scripts.build:watch:noreport: node preprocess && cross-env NODE_ENV=watch SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack --mode production
scripts.build:watch: node preprocess && npm run build:report && cross-env NODE_ENV=watch SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack --mode production
scripts.build:watch:local: node preprocess && npm run build:report && cross-env NODE_ENV=watch_local SASS_PATH=node_modules:src:node_modules/carbon-components/scss/globals/scss/vendor webpack --mode production
scripts.clean:all: shx rm -rf ./dist && shx rm -rf ./coverage && shx rm -rf ./package && shx rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.package:browser: npm run build:prod && shx mkdir -p package && cd dist && zip -Zd -r ../package/accessibility-checker-extension.zip .
